summary: BTS’s J-Hope Teaches “Fake Love” Choreography In New Preview For “Under 19”
title: BTS’s J-Hope Teaches “Fake Love” Choreography In New Preview For “Under 19”
body:
New Post has been published on http://www.btsvfan.com/btss-j-hope-teaches-fake-love-choreography-in-new-preview-for-under-19/

BTS’s J-Hope Teaches “Fake Love” Choreography In New Preview For “Under 19”

BTS’s J-Hope will be appearing on the next episode of MBC’s “Under 19”!

“Under 19” is an idol debut survival show where aspiring singers, rappers, and dancers under the age of 19 learn from celebrity mentors and compete against one another for spots in a new nine-member boy group.

At the end of the December 29 episode, the program aired a preview for next week’s episode. In the clip, MC Kim So Hyun announces the show’s third mission, in which contestants from the vocal, dance, and rap teams will mix to form new units and compete against each other.

She then reveals that the six songs for the shuffle mission are BTS’s “Fake Love,” EXO’s “Growl,” SHINee’s “Sherlock,” TVXQ’s “Mirotic,” BEAST’s “Fiction,” and INFINITE’s “Be Mine.”

The preview goes on to show J-Hope walking into a practice room and teaching the “Fake Love” choreography to some of the contestants. As he watches them dance, he says encouragingly, “That’s correct. You’re doing well.” He then tells a mystery contestant that he’s growing fond of him before cheering him on.

The next episode of “Under 19” will air on January 5 at 6 p.m. KST.

blog.name: ao3feed-yoonkookseok
blog.title: fly with me
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jeon Jungkook/Jung Hoseok | J-Hope/Min Yoongi | Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

summary: you're my happily ever after, i think
title: you're my happily ever after, i think
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2QbrYH5

by aimandignite

Taehyung works in the coffee shop on campus. The pay is terrible but the coffee is pretty good and the discount is great. It’s easy to meet up for group projects, and his friends don’t mind hanging around while he closes up because they get to eat all the baked goods that are done for the day.

His life is pretty simple. Busy, but simple. He has his friends, he has his school work, and he has his job. It all works and it all works smoothly, which is what Tae loves most about it.

Well, it did work smoothly. Until his manager decided to add another barista.

Or:

Jimin is a Prince hiding his identity in an attempt to live a normal life and Taehyung is annoyed by everything Jimin does. Until he’s not.

Words: 6094, Chapters: 1/6, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Kim Taehyung | V, Park Jimin (BTS), Kim Namjoon | RM, Kim Seokjin | Jin, Jeon Jungkook, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope, Min Yoongi | Suga
  • Relationships: Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin, Jeon Jungkook/Jung Hoseok | J-Hope/Min Yoongi | Suga, Kim Taehyung | V/Park Jimin
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Royalty, Prince Park Jimin (BTS), Alternate Universe - College/University, Alternate Universe - Coffee Shops & Cafés, Fluff and Angst, secret prince, Found Family, it’s the prince and me au that nobody asked for but we all needed

by aimandignite

Taehyung works in the coffee shop on campus. The pay is terrible but the coffee is pretty good and the discount is great. It’s easy to meet up for group projects, and his friends don’t mind hanging around while he closes up because they get to eat all the baked goods that are done for the day.

His life is pretty simple. Busy, but simple. He has his friends, he has his school work, and he has his job. It all works and it all works smoothly, which is what Tae loves most about it.

Well, it did work smoothly. Until his manager decided to add another barista.

Or:

Jimin is a Prince hiding his identity in an attempt to live a normal life and Taehyung is annoyed by everything Jimin does. Until he’s not.
